snippet: Anticholinergic medicine and Botox injections are equally effective in reducing episodes, a study shows, with those who took Botox more likely to see symptoms completely disappear.
abstract: Anticholinergic medicine and Botox injections are equally effective in reducing episodes, a study shows, with those who took Botox more likely to see symptoms completely disappear.

headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Regimens: Options in Treating Incontinence
